name: vue-awesome-notifications
description: Vue.js version of Awesome Notifications JavaScript library

scripts.build: rimraf dist/* && webpack --mode production --progress --hide-modules && cpx node_modules/awesome-notifications/src/styles/**/*.scss dist/styles && cpx node_modules/awesome-notifications/dist/style.css dist/styles
scripts.dev: rimraf dist/* && webpack --mode development --progress --hide-modules && cpx node_modules/awesome-notifications/src/styles/**/*.scss dist/styles && cpx node_modules/awesome-notifications/dist/style.css dist/styles

author: David Yunevich
